Lock-in Period: Earlier of: 21 years or marriage of girl

Tax Benefits under Income Tax Act, 1961: Interest up to ₹10,000 tax-free under Section 80TTA
Principal under Section 80C; Interest under Section 24(b) and Section 80EE
Section 80C; Maturity amount tax-free if policy term is more than 2 years
Premiums up to ₹25,000 for self, spouse, and dependent parents under Sec 80D; Up to ₹25,000 for senior citizen parents
